example.name: transitive
example.text: His giddy dream of [*] redeeming a life of `` badly aimed bullets '' by [*-2] punishing the `` real robbers '' -- the rich `` dogs '' who [*T*-1] prey on the poor -- leads only to the death of innocents , and eventually to his own .
